Package com.github.StarcraftButGood.game

Class Star

java.lang.Object
com.github.StarcraftButGood.game.Star
All Implemented Interfaces:
Actor
Direct Known Subclasses:
HomeStar
public class Star extends Object implements Actor
Represents a Star. Keeps track of a 3D instance, player controlling it, and its status.
Version:
6/1/23
Author:
Johnathan Kao, William Li, Period 5, Sources - None

  • Constructor Details

    • Star

      public Star(SinglePlayerGame game, float x, float z)
      Constructs a Star object in the specified game, at the specified location.
      Parameters:
      game - the game that the star is in
      x - the x coordinate to spawn the star at
      z - the z coordinate to spawn the star at

    • act

      public void act(float delta)
      Actions every tick. Has a chance to spawn a random troop: 15% chance to spawn an Aegis, 35% chance to spawn a Vanguard, and 50% chance to spawn a Ranger. Also adds resources to the player.
      Parameters:
      delta - the time, in seconds, since the last tick

    • getConquered

      public void getConquered(Mothership mothership)
      Called from the mothership class to when the mothership is located on the star's position. The star now belongs to a player.
      Parameters:
      mothership - the mothership that conquers this star
